creator: marco.bertrand@free.fr
text:
I installed Apache 1.3.26 + php 4.1.2 + MySQL on Solaris 8 with no problem.

Then I installed Apache 1.3.26 + SSL 1.48 with no problem

Then I installed Apache 1.3.26 + SSL 1.48 + php 4.1.2 + MySQL but Apache can't 
start ... Il I comment the line LoadModule libexec/libphp4.so, it works but if 
i decomment this line ... Apache seems to start but no processes are present 
and no error are returned ! and I got a core in / directory.

I tried thoses operations on Solaris 2.6 and got same results !

My old version is : apache 1.3.22 + SSL 1.47 + PHP 4.1.2 + MySQL and works fine.

The problem seems to happen with SSL 1.48 or Apache 1.3.26 .... on Solaris.

This bug seems to be similar with the bug #10109.

Thanks in advance.
Marc Bertrand.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 10109 ***
